sentences.en: Fault gouge is an important factor which influences fault movement.
sentences.cn: 断层泥是影响断层运动的重要地质因素.

sentences.en: Gouge and Backstab have new sounds.
Gouge does not award a combo point anymore.
He has accused her of threatening to gouge his eyes out.
sentences.cn: 他指控她曾威胁要挖出他的眼睛。

sentences.en: He heard the heavy rounds gouge the ancient concrete, followed by the panicked cries of Grunts in the distance as they dove for cover—and into the semi-gelatinous, ankle-deep liquid.
sentences.cn: 子弹凿击古老混凝土的声音清晰可辨，接着远处传来了野猪兽卧倒在深及脚踝的半凝胶状液体中隐蔽时恐慌的呼喊声。

sentences.en: I tried to gouge a scar in her memory.
sentences.cn: 我竭力想在她脑子里刻上个印迹.

sentences.en: I wanted to gouge her eyes out.
sentences.cn: 我那时想把她的双眼挖出来.

sentences.en: If the gouge layer is thin, contact between asperities on the rock surfaces can occur.
sentences.cn: 如果充填物层很薄, 两个岩石表面上的凸起物就有可能互相接触.

sentences.en: In the Middle Ages, a favourite punishment was to gouge out a prisoner's eyes.
sentences.cn: 在中世纪, 惩罚犯人最常用的办法是剜眼睛.

sentences.en: In the Middle Ages, a favourite punishment was to gouge out prisoner's eyes.
sentences.cn: 中世纪惩罚犯人最常用的办法是剜眼睛.

sentences.en: Jump backward while you gouge, bandage when you are just right outside of his melee range.
sentences.cn: 当你凿击的时候跳后, 绷带当你正好再攻击范围以外.

sentences.en: So, it is possible to create tool paths which gouge unless you are ery careful.
sentences.cn: 因此, 除非你非常小心很可能会产生过切的刀具路径.

sentences.en: That outcome reduces choice and allows the remaining players to price - gouge.
sentences.cn: 这种结果减少了企业的选择,只能让剩下的企业在价格上玩手段.

sentences.en: The gouge of the fault zone may extend to depths of some kilometers.
sentences.cn: 断层区的断层泥可能伸展到若干公里的深度.

sentences.en: Will you gouge out the eyes of these men?
sentences.cn: 难道你要剜这些人的眼睛 吗 ?

phrases.tran_cn: 断层泥；断层破碎物；耳巴泥

trans.tran_cn: 挖凿，用拇指插入…的眼睛，欺诈，诈取
